The story revolves around Chris' search for his estranged wife, Lila (played by Sigourney Weaver)). While on the journey to find Lila, Chris comes across an international bounty hunter named Louis (played by William Hurt))). Louis is hired by a group of French soldiers who are guarding a group of prisoners - including Chris and Louis themselves - who have escaped from their respective prison camps.

The movie stars Liam Neeson as Oskar Schindler, Ben Kingsley as the Jewish SS Officer, and Ralph Fiennes as the head of the Jewish Council in Branas. The supporting cast includes Emma Thompson as the wife of Oskar Schindler, John Malkovich as a wealthy businessman who helps Oskar Schindler escape to America from Branas, and Julia Roberts as a young woman who becomes involved with the story of Oskar Schindler.
